author: bayard
msg: Applying my patch from LANG-535 - adding support to getShortClassName and getPackageName for arrays, including primitive arrays and multi-dimensional arrays. Also stopped getPackageName relying on the underlying class.getPackage as it's sometimes null

author: lindner
msg: SHINDIG-1186 | Patch from Mark Weitzel | /gadgets/metadata does not handle Transfer-Encoding according to the HTTP/1.1 spec

author: suresh
msg: HDFS-677. Rename failure when both source and destination quota exceeds results in deletion of source. Contributed by Suresh Srinivas.
